about: Cloud Platform & DevOps Engineer with strong expertise in OpenShift/Kubernetes administration, Red Hat Ceph (RGW/S3, RBD), and enterprise-scale cloud operations. Skilled in PostgreSQL and MongoDB cluster management, CI/CD process automation (Jenkins, ArgoCD, GitLab CI), and Linux system administration. Experienced in designing and optimizing storage systems, implementing infrastructure automation with Ansible/AWX, and developing S3-based inventory and operational tools. Passionate about AI-powered automation, including AI agents, model deployment, and integration with Ollama, OpenDataHub, and OpenWebUI. Currently serving as Ceph Team Lead at Türk Telekom, with prior roles at Halkbank and Etiya.
